name: Lethal Consumption(Alpha Test)
description: Jon awakes to find an almost apocalyptic world being over ran by mutated fruits and veggies. Better known as Newts or nutritious food. Disgusted to find his unhealthy lifestyle flipped upside down, he is determined to destroy the Newts and put an end to the madness, ultimately returning to a normal way of life! GM O's, more like GM Oh no! Join Jon on his quest to take out the newts and stop the bad man in Lethal Consumption!
